SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core

Interface Effectable

All Known Subinterfaces:
YaegerScene
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, CompositeEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicScene, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ScrollableDynamicScene, ShapeEntity, SplashScene, SpriteEntity, StaticScene, TextEntity, YaegerEntity, YaegerGameObject
public interface Effectable
By implementing the interface Effectable, it is possible to apply various effects on both a YaegerScene and a YaegerEntity.

  • Method Details

    • setBrightness

      void setBrightness(double brightness)
      Set the brightness of the YaegerScene or YaegerEntity. The value should be a value between -1 and 1, inclusive.

      The brightness adjustment value. 

            Min: -1.0 Completely dark
      Max: +1.0 Fully bright
      Parameters:
      brightness - the brightness as a double, between -1 and 1

    • getBrightness

      double getBrightness()
      Return the brightness level of this YaegerScene or YaegerEntity. Brightness is a double between -1 and 1, where 
            Min: -1.0 Completely dark
      Max: +1.0 Fully bright
      Returns:
      The brightness as a double.

    • setContrast

      void setContrast(double contrast)
      Set the contrast of the YaegerScene or YaegerEntity. The value should be a value between -1 and 1, inclusive.

      The contrast adjustment value. 

            Min: -1.0 No contrast
      Max: +1.0 Maximum contrast
      Parameters:
      contrast - the contrast as a double, between -1 and 1

    • getContrast

      double getContrast()
      Return the contrast level of this YaegerScene or YaegerEntity. Contrast is a double between -1 and 1, where 
            Min: -1.0 No contrast
      Max: +1.0 Maximum contrast
      Returns:
      The contrast as a double.

    • setHue

      void setHue(double hue)
      Set the hue of the YaegerScene or YaegerEntity. The value should be a value between -1 and 1, inclusive.

      The contrast adjustment value. 

            Min: -1.0 Minimum hue
      Max: +1.0 Maximum hue
      Parameters:
      hue - the hue as a double, between -1 and 1

    • getHue

      double getHue()
      Return the contrast level of this YaegerScene or YaegerEntity. Hue is a double between -1 and 1, where 
            Min: -1.0 Minimum hue
      Max: +1.0 Maximum hue
      Returns:
      The contrast as a double.

      Set the saturation of the YaegerScene or YaegerEntity. The value should be a value between -1 and 1, inclusive.

            Min: -1.0 Minimum saturation
      Max: +1.0 Maximum saturation

    • getSaturation

      double getSaturation()
      Return the saturation level of this YaegerScene or YaegerEntity. Saturation is a double between -1 and 1, where

      Max: +1.0 Maximum saturation
      Returns:
      The saturation as a double.
